attributes.action: Local Authority Council Contractor's to STOP HOLDING TO RANSOM FAMILIES PASSPORTS eg ALL FORMS OF IDENTITY and Family photographs of their loved ones!
attributes.additional_details:
Under The Human Rights Act and Date Protection Protocols...We the undesigned agree that a Council Contractors  (Local Removal Company Masons Moving Group Ltd) should RETURN....said documents and not contravene the HRA (ECHR)

The Removal Group Have Held to ransom all my familys IDENTITY eg all forms of Identitification,

Passports
Birth cetificates etc etc
and All our family Original photgraphs of all our loved ones living ang deceased. for FOUR YEARS!

Please help a family get back their Uninalienable rights

Thank you
